files.description: Setup script for the Quran search application. Uses setuptools to configure package details, version, packages, and installation requirements.
List of package requirements for the Quran search application. Currently empty, serving as a placeholder for future dependencies.
Initializer file for the src package. Ensures the directory is treated as a Python package.
Module for loading Quran data from a text file. Contains functions to read, parse, and return Quran verses as a list of dictionaries.

functions.name: load_quran_text
functions.description: Load Quran text from a file. Reads the file and parses each line formatted as 'surah_number|ayah_number|verse_text'.

parameters.name: file_path
parameters.description: Path to the Quran text file.

functions.name: load_quran_data
functions.description: Alias for load_quran_text, providing backward compatibility for loading Quran data.

parameters.name: file_path
parameters.description: Path to the Quran text file.

files.description: Module for searching words and phrases in loaded Quran data. It defines a comprehensive set of functions including word search, phrase search, counting occurrences, and calculating gematrical (Abjad) values using a standard letter mapping.

functions.name: search_word_in_quran
functions.description: Searches for a given word in the Quran data. It supports case-sensitive and case-insensitive modes and returns a list of verses containing the search word.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

parameters.name: search_word
parameters.description: The word to search for within the verse text.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag indicating if the search is case-sensitive; defaults to False.

functions.name: search_word_group
functions.description: Searches for an exact word group (phrase) in the Quran data. It returns verses where the phrase occurs and supports optional case sensitivity.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The phrase to search for within the verses.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag indicating if the search should be case-sensitive; defaults to False.

functions.name: search_word_in_surah
functions.description: Searches for a specific word within a given Surah of the Quran data. It returns verses where the word is present.

parameters.name: word
parameters.description: The word to search for.

parameters.name: surah_number
parameters.description: The number of the Surah to search within.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

functions.name: search_word_group_in_surah
functions.description: Searches for a word group (phrase) within a specified Surah. It supports case-sensitive and case-insensitive search and returns verses containing the phrase.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The phrase to search for.

parameters.name: surah_number
parameters.description: The target Surah number.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag for case-sensitive search; defaults to False.

functions.name: count_word_occurrences
functions.description: Counts the total number of occurrences of a given word in all Quran verses using a case-insensitive approach.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

parameters.name: word
parameters.description: The word to count within the verses.

functions.name: count_word_occurrences_in_surah
functions.description: Counts the occurrences of a specific word within a designated Surah in the Quran data using case-insensitive matching.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

parameters.name: word
parameters.description: The word to count.

parameters.name: surah_number
parameters.description: The target Surah number.

functions.name: count_word_group_occurrences_in_surah
functions.description: Counts the total non-overlapping occurrences of a word group within a specified Surah in the Quran data.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The phrase whose occurrences are to be counted.

parameters.name: surah_number
parameters.description: The target Surah number.

functions.name: count_word_group_occurrences
functions.description: Counts the total number of occurrences of a word group (phrase) in the entire Quran data using a case-insensitive search.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The phrase to count within the verses.

functions.name: search_word_in_verse_range
functions.description: Searches for a word within a specified range of verses. It returns verses where the word is found within the start and end verse boundaries.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

parameters.name: word
parameters.description: The word to search for.

parameters.name: start_verse
parameters.description: Tuple (surah_number, ayah_number) indicating the start of the verse range.

parameters.name: end_verse
parameters.description: Tuple (surah_number, ayah_number) indicating the end of the verse range.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag for case-sensitive search; defaults to False.

functions.name: search_word_group_in_verse_range
functions.description: Searches for a word group within a specified range of verses and returns the verses that contain the phrase.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The phrase to search for.

parameters.name: start_verse
parameters.description: Tuple (surah_number, ayah_number) indicating the start of the range.

parameters.name: end_verse
parameters.description: Tuple (surah_number, ayah_number) indicating the end of the range.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag for case-sensitive search; defaults to False.

functions.name: count_word_occurrences_in_verse_range
functions.description: Counts the number of occurrences of a word within a given verse range, with an option for case-sensitive matching.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

parameters.name: word
parameters.description: The word to count.

parameters.name: start_verse
parameters.description: Tuple (surah_number, ayah_number) representing the start of the range.

parameters.name: end_verse
parameters.description: Tuple (surah_number, ayah_number) representing the end of the range.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag for case-sensitive matching; defaults to False.

functions.name: search_verses_by_word_count
functions.description: Searches for verses that contain exactly a specified number of words.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

parameters.name: word_count
parameters.description: The exact word count to match.

functions.name: search_verses_by_word_count_multiple
functions.description: Searches for verses where the word count is a multiple of a specified number. Raises a ValueError if the multiple is zero.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

parameters.name: multiple_of
parameters.description: The integer multiple to check the word count against.

functions.name: calculate_gematrical_value
functions.description: Calculates the gematrical (Abjad) value of a given Arabic text based on standard letter mappings.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: Arabic word or phrase to calculate the gematrical value for.

functions.name: search_words_by_gematrical_value
functions.description: Searches for individual words in the Quran data whose gematrical value matches the specified target value.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

parameters.name: target_value
parameters.description: The target gematrical value to match.

functions.name: search_word_groups_by_gematrical_value
functions.description: Searches for verses where a word group is found and its gematrical value matches the target value. Returns matching verses.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The word group (phrase) to search for.

parameters.name: target_value
parameters.description: The target gematrical value to match.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag for case-sensitive matching; defaults to False.

functions.name: search_verses_by_word_gematrical_value_equals_word_count
functions.description: Searches for verses where the total word count equals the gematrical value of a specified word group.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The word group to calculate the gematrical value for.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag for case-sensitive evaluation; defaults to False.

functions.name: calculate_surah_gematrical_value
functions.description: Calculates the cumulative gematrical value of all words in a specified Surah.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

parameters.name: surah_number
parameters.description: The Surah number for which to calculate the value.

functions.name: calculate_verse_range_gematrical_value
functions.description: Calculates the total gematrical value for verses within a specified overall verse number range.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

parameters.name: start_verse_num
parameters.description: The starting overall verse number (inclusive).

parameters.name: end_verse_num
parameters.description: The ending overall verse number (inclusive).

functions.name: calculate_quran_gematrical_value
functions.description: Calculates the total gematrical value of the entire Quran by summing the gematrical values of all words.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

functions.name: search_word_at_position
functions.description: Searches for verses where a specified word appears at a given 1-indexed position in the verse.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

parameters.name: word
parameters.description: The word to search for.

parameters.name: position
parameters.description: The 1-indexed position in the verse to check for the word.

functions.name: search_word_group_at_position
functions.description: Searches for verses where a specified word group starts at a given position in the verse.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The word group (phrase) to search for.

parameters.name: position
parameters.description: The 1-indexed starting position in the verse.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag for case-sensitive matching; defaults to False.

functions.name: search_verses_by_word_gematrical_value_equals_verse_number
functions.description: Searches for verses where the gematrical value of a specified word equals the verse (ayah) number.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

parameters.name: word
parameters.description: The word to evaluate.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag for case-sensitive matching; defaults to False.

functions.name: search_verses_by_word_gematrical_value_equals_surah_number
functions.description: Searches for verses where the gematrical value of a given word equals the Surah number.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

parameters.name: word
parameters.description: The word to evaluate.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag for case-sensitive matching; defaults to False.

functions.name: search_verses_by_verse_gematrical_value_equals
functions.description: Searches for verses where the total gematrical value of all words equals a specified target value.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

parameters.name: target_value
parameters.description: The target gematrical value to match.

files.description: This is the main entry point for the Quran search application. It loads Quran data using functions from the quran_data_loader module and performs various search operations by invoking functions from the quran_search module. The results of the searches are printed to the console.

functions.name: main
functions.description: Main function to load Quran data, perform a series of search operations and print the results. It demonstrates various functionalities such as searching for words and phrases, counting occurrences, and handling verse ranges.

files.description: Initializer file for the tests package. Marks the directory as a Python package for unit tests.

Contains unit tests for the Quran search functionalities using the unittest framework. This file tests various functions from the quran_search module under different scenarios including case sensitivity, verse range searches, and gematrical value calculations.

classes.name: TestQuranSearch
classes.description: Unit tests for functions in the quran_search module and related functionality.

methods.name: test_search_allah_word
methods.description: Tests that searching for the word 'اللَّهِ' returns at least one verse using case-insensitive search.

parameters.name: self
parameters.description: Instance of the test case.

files.description: Data file containing Quran text in Uthmani script. Each line is formatted as 'surah_number|ayah_number|verse_text'.
